description:
Describes the area that the ball touched:
* deep - the ball landed in the deep zone (ball landed between 39 and 44 feet deep in the court)
* mid - the ball landed in the mid zone (ball landed between 34 and 39 feet deep in the court)
* short - the ball landed in the short zone (ball landed between 29 and 34 feet deep in the court)
* kitchen - the ball landed in the kitchen zone (ball landed between 22 and 29 feet deep in the court)
* net - the ball hit the net
* out - the ball landed out of bounds
title: Bounce
